title: Any Given Sunday
description: Sean loves Lauren. Chad loves Sean. Lauren loves Sean and Chad.When an opportunity arises for the threesome to explore their deep desires, they plunge into a sex-filled, emotionally charged ménage. Long-buried feelings are revealed, changing their lives irrevocably.Whether for better or worse, only Sean, Chad and Lauren can decide.Any Given Sunday is the seventh book in New York Times bestselling author Mari Carr’s Wild Irish series.
author: Mari Carr
